summary:
This is a simple save game of my female character Eneris.
She is Ningheim, level 1 , with UNPB BBP body, is inside Helgen Keep with 2H sword.

To work properly you need:
1 Lastest Version of Skyrim Update;
2 Ningheim Race;
3 SG HAir PACK (you can find it searching on google";
4 Race Menu;
5 Obvius
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple save game of my female character Eneris.
She is Ningheim, level 1 , with UNPB BBP body, is inside Helgen Keep with 2H sword.

To work properly you need:
1 Lastest Version of Skyrim Update;
2 Ningheim Race;
3 SG HAir PACK (you can find it searching on google";
4 Race Menu;
5 Obviusly lastest SKSE plugin.

INTALLATION:(manual only)
You need to copy all files in your skyrim save game folder (documents/my games/skyrim/saves)

UNISTALL:
Just delete the files

Have fun with this!
Report eny issue!
Do not post this file anywhere or use it without my permission!

Credits:
All credits go to Skyrim and the author of the MODS named up.
author: lucazzomio
